message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can work out a better deal later if you like.
I'll give you a better deal. I'll take 60% and you get 40%.
I'm willing to negotiate, but 60/40 is too much for me to accept. Let's try 70/30.  We both get a decent share.
I'll meet you halfway. 55/45 is a fair compromise, considering the inflation.
I'm feeling generous. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking 60%. This is a better deal for you than the previous round, and we can avoid further inflation.
